{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21455v1", "title": "A Probabilistic Proof for Stable Fluctuations in the Extremal Process of
  Branching Brownian Motion", "summary": "We give a probabilistic proof for the emergence of the Stable-$1$ Law for the
random fluctuations of the mass of the extremal process of branching Brownian
Motion away from its tip. This result was already shown by Mytnik et al. albeit
using PDE techniques. As a consequence, we demystify the origin of these
fluctuations and the meaning of the deterministic centering function required.", "main_category": "math.PR", "categories": "math.PR", "published": "2025-04-30T09:23:14Z"}
